description:
On the planet the Witch`s Harp, a land where almost all food is given as tribute to the queen and the people are in a food shortage, they meet a young man named Nichola who is killed over a tiny amount of food. Enraged, Tetsuro and Maetel set off to the queen`s island to stop this tributary system. However, there they have a surprising discovery...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Symphonic Poem and the Witch`s Harp
交響詩 魔女の堅琴
